short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to perform a hard refresh on any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Real Refresh - Hard Refresh with One Click

Real Refresh makes it easy to perform a hard refresh (CTRL+F5) on any webpage with a single click. Bypass the cache and reload pages instantly to see the latest updates without manually clearing the browser cache. Perfect for developers, content editors, and anyone needing up-to-date content fast. Simple, sleek, and always accessible from your Chrome toolbar.

Effortless refreshing, no extra steps required!
